page.title: 10FERRY SERVICES TO RHUM
page.content:
The Caledonian Macbrayne ferry, The Lochmor (passenger ferry only) sails from Mallaig 4 times a week stopping at Canna, Rhum, Eigg and sometimes Muck. It calls at Rhum on a Monday and a Wednesday afternoon, and on a Thursday and Saturday morning. In the summer the Lochmor runs twice on a Saturday. Each year the Lochmor goes off for servicing and is replaced by the Pioneer for several weeks. The Lochmor also carries mail and freight for delivery to the islands.
During the summer there is a small tourist boat from Arisaig that comes to the island on a Tuesday and Thursday afternoon. This boat, called the Shearwater, allows tourists to come for several hours on these afternoons.
